rukus.text: 37|1|a l laoh sbath nung banda anak del rieb cheachuor( krom mea la- ai kat) .
37|2|a l laoh sbath nung banda anak del noam popk( krom mea la- ai kat) .
37|3|a l laoh sbath nung banda anak del sautr bantoul robsa  a l laoh( krom mea la ai kat) .
37|4|pitabrakd nasa  mcheasa del trauv korp sakkar robsa puok anak  ku mean temuoyokt .

37|5|chea mcheasa krobkrong mekh cheachraen chean  ning phendei  ning avei del  mean nowchanloh vea teangpir  haey chea mcheasa del krobkrong tisa nei preah  atity reah  ning tisa nei preahatity lich .
37|6|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban loma mekh chean timuoy nei phendei  loma daoy phkay cheachraen .
37|7|haey( yeung thveu aoy phkay teangnoh) karpar ampi shai t n teang  asa del rungrousa .
37|8|puokvea min ach tow lobasdab banda mea la ai kat(pipheaksaea  knea) ban laey  haey puokvea nung trauv ke kb( daoy phleung phkay)pi  krobtisati
37|9|daembi b ne  d nh puokvea .  haey puokvea nung ttuol tearounakamm chea  amt
37|10|leuklengte anaknea del ban luochasdab( peakyasaamdei mea- la ai kat)  ruoch phkay del mean phleung ban denh tam dot vea bonnaoh .

37|11|dau che  neah  chaur anak( mou ham meat)  suor puokke( puok mou sh ri ki n) tha  tae puokke chea anak khlang cheang  ryyavei(mekh dei  mea la ai kat) del yeung  ban bangkeut khlang cheang?  pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban bangkeut puokke ampi  dei del saet .
37|12|phtoytowvinh  anak( mou ham meat) nguengochhngal yeang khlang khn  del puokke chamak meulngeay( champoh kompir kuor an  ning saamnuor robsa  anak) .
37|13|haey nowpel del puokke trauv ke romluk  puokke bercha min  yk chetd toukdeak towvinh .
37|14|haey nowpel del puokke bankheunh phosdo tang namuoy  puokke ka chamak meulngeay .
37|15|haey puokke ban niyeay tha  nih kmeanoavei krawpi m nd akm  da chbasaleasa noh laey .
37|16|tae nowpel del puok yeung slab  haey puok yeung ban  klaytowchea dei ning chhaoeng haey noh  puok yeung pitchea trauv ke thveu aoy rsa  chenhpi phnaur laengvinh men ryy
37|17|haey tae chidaunchitea robsa puok yeung pimoun( ka trauv ke thveu aoy  rsa chenhpi phnaur laengvinh) der ryy
37|18|chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha  pit haey( puok anak nung trauv  ke thveu aoy rsa chenhpi phnaur laengvinh teangoasa) daoy puok anakchea puok del  thaokteab .
37|19|haey tampit vea( kar rsa chenhpi phnaur laengvinh)kreante  chea kar phlomtre muoy dng bonnaoh .  pelnoh puokke srabte meul  kheunh( pheap vukavr nei thngai barlok) .
37|20|haey puokke ban niyeay tha  ao vineasa a nd reay haey puok  yeung.  nih kuchea thngai chomnoumchomreah .
37|21|nih haey kuchea thngai katsechakdei  del puok anak thleab ban  bdeseth nung vea noh .
